text:
You want irony? An elderly friend finally got her #COVID #vaccine shot in #RVa. Massive crowds packed in with NO SOCIAL DISTANCING! 

Welcome to @GovernorVA’s #Virginia. Get your vaccination, get #COVID19! 🤬

I won’t even get into #VDH’s lack of clear instructions, mass chaos. https://t.co/lGTfjbtJwG
